caption_text:
BECAUSE LOVE IS WILD, FANCY, AND FREE 🌈🪩💖🎈

Introducing the official theme for LOVE IS THE MESSAGE:
🎊 CIRQUE DU SLAY 🎊

It’s time to let yourself take centre stage, wow the crowds, layer on that makeup, get your freak on, pull out all the stunts, dress in all the frills, prepare for all the thrills and party like there’s no tomorrow. 

(oh, and maybe clown around)

Here are some vibes / looks / atmospheres that have inspired this theme as we ramp up for the craziest night out in KW

We cannot wait to move with you as we celebrate love’s unstoppable groove together like they did back at The Gallery

(vibes: campy, clowny, ecstatic, colourful, over-the-top, classic, regal, overall FUNNNN) 🎊🎪🤹🤡🎠🎡✨

The Hub, Dancember 6
TICKET LINK IN BIO
SEE YOU AT THE DISCO
